response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product, with its advanced features and exceptional quality, offers unparalleled value. Considering its worth to us and its potential impact on your business, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. We believe this is a fair offer that respects both the value we place on the product and the value you see in it. Please let us know if you have any questions or need more information to make a decision.", "product_price": 10000}
